title: Veg Art
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Macrobiotic, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery, European
description: A small raw food/bakery/juice bar with a daily changing food menu. The whole shop/cafe is all-vegan, as is the owner. Welcoming atmosphere. There are a few high tables and possibly more seating downstairs. Good for take-out. Stocks a lot of produce.
streetAddress: Calle Los Cancajos, Aptos Las Olas C3, Brena Baja
